page.name: Squeak Project Pages
page.text: To use Squeak project pages in your Swiki, you (the administrator) must set up your Swiki to use project forms (see *13*). Also, you (the client) must install the *Squeak plug-in>http://www.squeakland.org/detect.html*. !Speeding Up Project Pages For faster loading time for projects, install the project swiki code into your plug-in image: -Download *http:/plug-in/SwikiNavigation.st* -Start the plug-in image (outside the browser) -Halo click on the background; select the red halo; choose 'desktop menu...'; choose 'open...'; choose 'file list' -File in <tt>SwikiNavigation.st</tt> -Destroy both flaps (Bring up halos on them; select the red halo; choose 'destroy this flap'; choose 'yes') (If you do NOT do this, there will be duplicate flaps for some odd reason) -Save and Quit (again, get the desktop menu to do this) After these step(s), you are ready to use the project swiki.
